Room.Name: Rutger Castle Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the south side of a guard post whose sentries block the road.
Room.LongDescription: There is a tiny kiosk, painted with red and white stripes, standing at the the side of the road. A few meters away you see a barracks for the troops that maintain this post. A long pole has been lowered across the road, apparently to require travelers to stop. It would be easy to walk around.
